DOC.brief_summary: Using growth factor obtain patient 's venous blood mixed particulate autogenous bone study compare bone gain implant gold standard sinus Lift procedure future implant insertion .
DOC.brief_title: Posterior Maxillary Ridge Augmentation With Sinus Lift Using Mineralized Plasmatic Matrix Versus Autogenous Bone Graft
DOC.detailed_description: To study effectiveness MPM ridge augmentation implant insertion compare autogenous bone graft . -PICO Population ( P ) : Patients defective posterior maxillary alveolar ridge . Intervention ( I ) : Implant placement ridge augmentation MPM . Comparator ( C ) : Autogenous bone graft . Outcome ( O ) : Patient satisfaction - Implant stability .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients systemically free . 2 . Patients posterior maxillary defective ridge indicate sinus lift procedure . 3 . Cases 5 mm bone height less included study . 4 . Age 18 50 year . 5 . Both sex . 6 . Patients physically able tolerate surgical restorative procedure . 7 . Good oral hygiene . 8 . Highly motivate patient . 1 . Patients allergic local anesthetic agent . 2 . Medium heavy smoker . 3 . Pregnant female . 4 . Presence pathosis preimplant site . 5 . Presence mucosal disease . 6 . History oral radiotherapy . 7 . History prolong steroid use . 8 . Psychological disorder .
